subject: Football
Ramadan
Muslim-Americans
lead_paragraph: Two-a-day football practices at Fordson High School in Dearborn, Mich., whose enrollment is 90 percent Muslim, coincided this week with Ramadan, leading to an interesting scheduling solution.
snippet: Two-a-day football practices at Fordson High School in Dearborn, Mich., whose enrollment is 90 percent Muslim, coincided this week with Ramadan, leading to an interesting scheduling solution.
